Updated Dependency Versions
===========================

Direct Dependencies:
-------------------
software.amazon.awssdk:s3 = 2.41.25
org.postgresql:postgresql = 42.7.9
org.projectlombok:lombok = 1.18.42
com.h2database:h2 = 2.4.240

Spring Boot Managed Dependencies (via parent):
---------------------------------------------
org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-parent = 3.4.1
  - spring-boot-starter-web
  - spring-boot-starter-thymeleaf
  - spring-boot-starter-amqp
  - spring-boot-starter-data-jpa
  - spring-boot-starter-test
  - spring-boot-devtools
  - spring-boot-configuration-processor

com.fasterxml.jackson.core:jackson-databind (managed by Spring Boot)

Build Information:
-----------------
Java Version: 21
Maven Version: 3.9.x (via wrapper)
Spring Boot Version: 3.4.1

Compatibility Matrix:
--------------------
✓ Java 21 LTS
✓ Spring Boot 3.4.1
✓ Jakarta EE 10
✓ Hibernate 6.6.4
✓ AWS SDK 2.x
